rules_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has double strike.
Equip {2}{R}
Madness {2}{R} [i](If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
When Dwarven War Hatchet enters, if you cast it for its madness cost, attach it to target creature you control.
